definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: wrapper, mantle;—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Ge 9:23 +, cstr. [[שִׂמְלַת]] De 21:13, De 22:5; sf. [[שִׂמְלָֽתְךָ]] De 8:4, etc.; pl. [[שְׂמָלֽת]] Ge 45:22, Ge 45:22 +, sf. [[שִׂמְלֽתָם]] Ge 44:13 +, etc.;—wrapper, mantle (of man or [Ru 3:3 +] woman), usu. square piece of cloth worn as outer garment (v. Mackie:Hast. DB. i. 625; Benz:Ency. Bib. iii. 2932), Ge 35:2, Ex 22:26 (both E), De 8:4, De 10:18, De 21:13, De 22:3, Is 3:6, Is 3:7, Is 9:4, 2Sa 12:20 Kt, Ru 3:3 Kt (Qr in both pl.); as covering in sleep Ge 9:23 (J; cf. Ex 22:26), bed-covering De 22:17; covering or receptacle for articles Ex 12:34 (E), Ju Jdg 8:25, 1Sa 21:10, cf. Pr 30:4; more gen. garment, De 22:5, clothes (pl.) Ge 37:34, Ge 44:13 (J), Ge 41:14, Ex 19:10, Ex 19:14 (all E), Jos 7:6 (JE); as costly gifts Ge 45:22, Ge 45:22, Ex 3:22, Ex 12:35 (all E).
